item.title: Run Windows programs on Linux
item.description: This is the most important question that a Linux newbie faces - “How to run his/her favourite Windows application on Linux?” Well, here is a really short guide. For more help GIYF (Google Is Your Friend)! 1. Find the Linux versions of your Windows applications If you are lucky you might find that the developers have also created a Linux version for their software. In this case, you are, hmm.. lucky!
